popularityCurve.label: i went to see this guy in geelong a deep-tissue masseur and osteopath specialist called shane hamill who works with footballers it was my last throw of the dice and he found the injuries stemmed from a twisted spine and sacrum and a differential in leg length the left is five centimetres shorter than the right
